subject: Education
title: Learning Analytics: Measuring What Matters
description: A fast breakdown of Learning Analytics: Measuring What Matters for builders.

hook.text: Your LMS knows you logged in at 2 AM, skipped chapter 3, and rewatched the quiz prep video four times.

buildup.text: Learning analytics collects and analyzes data about learner behavior to improve outcomes.

discovery.text: Dashboards can flag at-risk students weeks before they fail, enabling early intervention.

twist.text: Most analytics measure clicks and time-on-pageâ€”proxies for learning, not learning itself.

climax.text: The gap between what's easy to measure and what matters for learning remains dangerously wide.

punchline.text: Counting clicks is easy. Measuring understanding is the real challenge.

quiz.question: What is the main limitation of current learning analytics?
options: They measure behavior proxies like clicks rather than actual understanding
They require too much storage space to be practical
Students enjoy being tracked and monitored constantly
